name: Poultry Punt
description:
This is our entry to Ludum Dare 34 with the theme Two Button Controls!

Rate our LD entry!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Game by:
Michael van Diest & Kurt Gietzen

Music by:
zac @meltycanon

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Controls:
S and K
thats it! on screen prompts will tell you what they do!
hit bombs to travel further and maximize your score
